title: Light, fast & responsive
text: Say goodbye to grumpy spinners and loaders!

section.title: Optimized!
section.content: Radiance is built with a phylosophy that no operation should take more than a couple of seconds to perform.

section.title: Responsive Design
section.content: Radiance support wide range of devices including but not limited to Mobile phones, Tablets, Laptops etc. Now take your work anywhere with ease
